title: Crossing the Jordan
summary: Joshua 3 recounts Israel’s miraculous crossing of the Jordan River. As the priests carrying the Ark step into the water, the river stops flowing, and the people cross on dry ground.

faq.question: What miracle occurred at the Jordan River?
faq.answer: The river stopped flowing when the priests carrying the Ark stepped into it.

faq.question: Why was this moment significant?
faq.answer: It confirmed God’s presence with Joshua and reminded the people of the Red Sea crossing.
